abstracts.cdata!:
The Ninth Imports Program Credit Project
            will: (i) provide foreign exchange for the import of raw
            materials, components and equipment to enable the
            industrial, construction and agricultural sectors to reach
            their full production potential; and (ii) support the policy
            improvements introduced or planned by GOB to increase the
            production, and efficiency and equity of the distribution of
            foodgrains, and thus to improve the overall conditions for
            economic growth in Bangladesh.
